content: Hi friends, I wonder how to contribute to Isabelle source code? I have checked https://isabelle.in.tum.de/repos/isabelle/ but seems no way to submit a pull request...

There is no real process to contribute. In short:

- if you are working on a tool (let's say the smt tool), contact the maintainer indicated at the top of the file (in that case, that would be me)
- if you want to add theorems, ask on the mailing list
fzyzcjy has marked this topic as resolved.
